downloadTitle: Administrator Template files (ADMX/ADML) for Dev Tunnels
downloadDescription: This download includes the Group Policy Administrative Template files (ADMX/ADML) for Dev Tunnels in Visual Studio, port forwarding built into Visual Studio Code, the devtunnel CLI, and the Visual Studio Code Remote - Tunnels extension.
detailsSection: This download includes the Group Policy Administrative Template files (ADMX/ADML) for Dev Tunnels in Visual Studio, port forwarding built into Visual Studio Code, the devtunnel CLI, and the Visual Studio Code Remote - Tunnels extension.
systemRequirementsSection:
Supported Operating Systems

Windows Server 2016, Windows Server 2019, Windows Server 2022, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, Windows 11
installInstructionSection:
To download and extract the ADMX/ADML files:
- Click the Download button (above) to download the files.
- Click Next and choose where to save the files.
- Go to the location where you saved the downloaded files, and double-click the admin templates executable (.exe) file, and follow the instructions to extract the files to a location of your choosing. We recommend to put the extracted files in the C:\Windows\PolicyDefinitions\ directory.

If you have Windows Server and Active Directory Domain Services (AD DS) deployed in your organization, you can configure settings for Dev Tunnels by using Group Policy. Copy the ADMX/ADML files to your AD DS environment and then use the Group Policy Management administrative tool to configure the Group Policy settings for Dev Tunnels.
